sentences.sContent: His life makes a compelling story .
sentences.sCn: 他的一生是个引人入胜的故事。

sentences.sContent: ...and there's no doubt companies are engineering their products and services to be more compelling and attractive but would want it any other way the intended result of making something better is that people use it more...
...one of the players that benefits the most from this story are the media: the notion of "extreme" climate simply makes for more compelling news...

synos.tran: 引人注目的；强制的；激发兴趣的
强迫；以强力获得（compel的ing形式）

remMethod.val: com ＋ pel(驱使) → 驱使去做 → 强迫

trans.tranOther: very interesting or exciting, so that you have to pay attention
